name: This Feels Great
description:
THIS FEELS GREAT is the title of four computer games specially developed for Annesley Black's portrait CD "no use in a centre" by Andreas Schönau, Jairo Gutiérrez, Jonas Hansen and Milan Grajetzki from the Academy of Media Arts Cologne. Each game is based on specific pieces of Annesley's music and combines them with the wonderful bizarre illustrations of Hazel Meyer into an unique form of explorative and musical play.

CREDITS:
music by Annesley Black
Visuals inspired by and in collaboration with Hazel Meyer

"THIS IS NOT WHAT I USUALLY DO" by Jairo Gutiérrez
based on HUMANS IN MOTION

"WHEN CONFUSION MAKES ME ANGRY" by Milan Grajetzki
based on TENDER PINK DESCENDER

"THE GERTRUDE INSTITUTE OF REPETITION" by Andreas Schönau
based on AORKO/ORCHESTRA PIECE

"TEARS FROM VARYING SPEEDS OF WIND" by Jonas Hansen
based on SMOOCHE DE LA ROOCHE II
